MCQuestion.q: How to insert a comment that has more than one line?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is /* comment */.

MCQuestion.q: Which attribute tells the browser where to go when a hyperlink is clicked?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is href.

MCQuestion.q: What HTML tag creates a bulleted list?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is ul. This provides a bulleted list.

MCQuestion.q: What class name would you make a full width container in Bootstrap?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is .container-fluid. This provides a full-width container.

MCQuestion.q: Which of the following function of String object returns a string representing the specified object?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is toString().

MCQuestion.q: Which of the following is an example of anonymous function in JavaScript?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is All of the above. It is not just one, but all the options given.

TFQuestion.q: A big challenge with responsive design is finding a balance between the content needs for both mobile and desktop. A desktop site has a lot of visual real estate that is often filled with carousels, videos, background images, and blocks of text.
TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True.

TFQuestion.q: A mobile first approach considers the goals of a mobile user and presents the content to help them achieve those goals. It removes all the content and presents a concise collection of content that loads fast.
TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True.

TFQuestion.q: Flexbox is NOT a core CSS technology but a custom named component created by Bootstrap.
TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is False. Flexbox is a core CSS technology.

TFQuestion.q: Cards replace panels, thumbnails, and wells used in Bootstrap 3 and are essentially a contained group of content with a border and inner padding.
TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True.

TFQuestion.q: All user-defined objects and built-in objects are descendants of an object called Object?
TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True. Descendants of an object are all-user defined objects and built-in objects.
Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True.

TFQuestion.q: The external JavaScript file must contain &ltscript> tag.
TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is False. It does not have to contain the <script> tag.

FillIn.q: Setting a grid tier of .col-sm-6 says
FillIn.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Make this div 6 columns wide.
Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is 16px.
Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is var.

FillIn.q: The absense of value in JavaScript means
FillIn.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is null.

FillIn.q: A string, number and ____ are primitive types in Javascript
FillIn.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Boolean.

ShortAnswer.q: Which of the following object represent parameters of current function inside any function?
ShortAnswer.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is arguments. They represent parameters of current functions inside any functions.
Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True. It returns true.
